name: The pain of dependency management with Baruch Sadogursky (Go Time #242)
summary: Baruch Sadogursky (Chief Sticker Officer at JFrog) joins Natalie &amp; Johnny to lament the current state of dependency management in Go and other languages. They discuss the problems dependency managers face, possible technical mitigations like SBOMs, people problems that will never be solved by tech, and take questio...
